org.openbase.jul.pattern

Interface Controller<M>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - Message
    All Superinterfaces:
    Activatable, Changeable, Pingable, Requestable<M>, Shutdownable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigurableController<ID,M,CONFIG>, IdentifiableController<ID,M>, MessageController<M,MB>, RegistryController<M>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConfigurableController, AbstractEnableableConfigurableController, AbstractExecutableController, AbstractIdentifiableController, AbstractLauncher, RSBCommunicationService

    public interface Controller<M>
extends Shutdownable, Activatable, Changeable, Pingable, Requestable<M>

    Divine Threepwood

        void waitForAvailabilityState(Controller.ControllerAvailabilityState controllerAvailabilityState)
                       throws InterruptedException
        Wait until the controller reached a given availability state.
        Parameters:
        controllerAvailabilityState - the state on which is waited
        Throws:
